name: Apple Adventure (open beta)
description:
An apple's planet is being invaded by aliens! Take to the skies and fight off the UFOs to save it's homeland!

Controls: 

Keyboard - WASD to move, Spacebar to fire. Escape brings you back a menu and pauses the game.

Controller - Left Analog to move, A to fire. B brings you back a menu and pauses the game. Might have issues when initially entering a menu.

Touch - Tap above/below the apple to move, tap to the right to fire. Currently only works within levels 1 to 3.

This game is still in development, so a lot of aspects need polish and refinement. Plus, *ahem* the rest of the game finishing...

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.
